entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:38 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 09:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.2°C

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:34 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 08:34 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 4.
